song.title: Make Your Own House
song.info:
Well as if i didn’t have habilities to be a DJ that scratches LPs, i realy would to mix and made stuff like them… So i sampled myself making noise with my old New Beat vinyls and record some loops to let you fly around this home House music around China, Africa and France…
C in China, C Countdown, Keep Smiling, Basic Theme et House of C – CONFETTI’S (Ramaerkers-Sas) 1989 Deesse
And the beat goes – THE WHISPER (Sylvers-Shokley-Shelby) 1990
Just as long as i got you – LOONEY TUNES (Bones-Dee) 1990
Pump it up – HYPNOTEK DJ (Ghidi-Maton) 1990
French Kiss – JUST LEE LEWIS (Louis) 1990
Night Move – RICKSTER feat STEWARD (Siepak) 1990
